Class Pad

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
      • Pad

  • public class Pad
extends Item
    This class holds all info of a pad: size, position, and so on.
    Version:
    2013-05-14
    Author:
    Jonathan Olergård, Jack Shabo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pad()
      Will create a pad at default coordinates, with default sizes, and that is not sticky.
      Pad(int X, int Y)
      Will create a pad at the specified coordinates, with default sizes, and that is not sticky.
      Pad(int X, int Y, int sizeX, int sizeY)
      Will create a pad at the specified coordinates and specified sizes, and that is not sticky.
      Pad(int X, int Y, int sizeX, int sizeY, int speed, boolean sticky)
      Will create a pad at the specified coordinates and specified sizes, and is sticky if specified so.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getSpeed()
      Get this pad's current speed in X-axis.
      int getSpeedY() 
      boolean isSticky()
      Checks whether this pad is sticky.
      void setSpeed(int speed)
      Set the speed for this pad in X-axis.
      void setSpeedY(int speed) 
      boolean toggleIsSticky()
      Makes this pad sticky, or not sticky.

      • Methods inherited from class Item

        getPosX, getPosY, getSizeX, getSizeY, getSpeedX, setPosX, setPosY, setSizeX, setSizeY, setSpeedX

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Pad

        public Pad()
        Will create a pad at default coordinates, with default sizes, and that is not sticky.

      • Pad

        public Pad(int X,
   int Y)
        Will create a pad at the specified coordinates, with default sizes, and that is not sticky.
        Parameters:
        X - The pad's starting X coordinate.
        Y - The pad's starting Y coordinate.

      • Pad

        public Pad(int X,
   int Y,
   int sizeX,
   int sizeY)
        Will create a pad at the specified coordinates and specified sizes, and that is not sticky.
        Parameters:
        X - The pad's starting X coordinate.
        Y - The pad's starting Y coordinate.
        sizeX - The pad's starting X size.
        sizeY - The pad's starting Y size.

      • Pad

        public Pad(int X,
   int Y,
   int sizeX,
   int sizeY,
   int speed,
   boolean sticky)
        Will create a pad at the specified coordinates and specified sizes, and is sticky if specified so.
        Parameters:
        X - The pad's starting X coordinate.
        Y - The pad's starting Y coordinate.
        sizeX - The pad's starting X size.
        sizeY - The pad's starting Y size.
        sticky - Whether the pad is sticky or not at creation.

    • Method Detail

      • isSticky

        public boolean isSticky()
        Checks whether this pad is sticky.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the pad is sticky, false otherwise.

      • toggleIsSticky

        public boolean toggleIsSticky()
        Makes this pad sticky, or not sticky.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the pad is sticky, false otherwise.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(int speed)
        Set the speed for this pad in X-axis.
        Parameters:
        speed - The new speed.

      • getSpeed

        public int getSpeed()
        Get this pad's current speed in X-axis.
        Returns:
